election_record.label: Massachusetts 1802 Clerk of the Senate

overview.note: "The Senate unanimously made choice of the Hon. DAVID COBB, Esq. for President, and Mr. GEORGE E. VAUGHAN, for Clerk." Columbian Centinel. Massachusetts Federalist (Boston, MA). May 29, 1802.

"BOSTON GAZETTE, MAY 27. TRULY FEDERAL ELECTION. The Civil Administration of this Commonwealth, was yesterday renewed, agreeably to the forms adopted by our fathers. In the Senate, the Hon. David Cobb, Esq. was unanimously elected President, and G.E. Vaughan, Esq. Secretary." Courier of New Hampshire (Concord, NH). June 3, 1802.

election_record.reference: Columbian Centinel. Massachusetts Federalist (Boston, MA). May 29, 1802.
Courier of New Hampshire (Concord, NH). June 3, 1802.
The Telescope: or, American Herald (Leominster, MA). June 3, 1802.
